com.davidsoergel.trees

Interface LengthWeightHierarchyNode<T,I extends LengthWeightHierarchyNode<T,I>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HierarchyNode<T,I>, Iterable<I>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PhylogenyNode<T>, RootedPhylogeny<T>, SerializablePhylogenyNode<T>, SerializableRootedPhylogeny<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRootedPhylogeny, BasicPhylogenyNode, BasicRootedPhylogeny

    public interface LengthWeightHierarchyNode<T,I extends LengthWeightHierarchyNode<T,I>>
extends HierarchyNode<T,I>
    A node of a tree with an associated branch length and weight.
    Version:
    $Id: LengthWeightHierarchyNode.java 352 2009-10-14 07:19:16Z soergel $
    Author:
    David Soergel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distanceToRoot()
      Returns the total branch length between the root and this node.
      double getGreatestBranchLengthDepthBelow()
      Returns the largest tree distance from this node to any leaf.
      double getLargestLengthSpan()
      Returns the largest tree distance between any pair of leaves descending from this node.
      double getLeastBranchLengthDepthBelow()
      Returns the smallest tree distance from this node to any leaf.
      Double getLength()
      Returns the length
      Double getWeight()
      Returns the weight, recomputing it if necessary

      Sets the length
      void setWeight(Double d)
      Sets the weight

      • distanceToRoot

        double distanceToRoot()
        Returns the total branch length between the root and this node.
        Returns:
        the sum of the branch lengths associated with all the nodes on the ancestor path from this node to the root, inclusive.
